channel.description: Recent content in Programming on Rohan Gupta

item.title: Factorials & Fun with Vim
item.description: I recently hit a somewhat important milestone in my life: one year as a Vim user. Despite its steep learning curve, I used to think that mastering Vim was mostly about habit formation. I swore by the cheatsheets and believed I would be golden. After all, a text editor couldn’t be too terribly complex, right? However, I soon realised how little I knew about Vim and how much there really was to know!
